short_summary: Furniture and office furniture are needed to be delivered and installed at a specific location by a set date.
description: The Department of National Defence requires the purchase and delivery of office furniture and equipment to a specific location by a set date. Once delivery has been made, installation will occur. Contact information is provided to answer any questions you have.
full_summary:
# PSIB-SAAE Categories 1, 2 & 3 Bids Invitation
## Reference Information
* Reference Number: cb-335-44327255
* Amendment Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: W0103-249585
* Publication Date: 2023-10-10
* Closing Date: 2023-10-24T17:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-10-24

## Project Description
The Department of National Defence invites bids for office furnishings in Categories 1, 2 and 3 as per the [Supply Arrangement (SA) #E60PQ-140003/C](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21761/en_rfb_w0103-249585.pdf). The requirement involves the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Victoria, British Columbia by 18 December 2023.

This bid invitation is part of the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and is set aside from international trade agreements.

## Categories
* Product Category 1: Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems
* Product Category 2: Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products
* Product Category 3: Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets

## Security Requirements
The procurement will require a security clearance.

## Eligible Suppliers
Suppliers must be registered on the Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C to be eligible.

## Evaluation Criteria
The bid proposals will be evaluated on their price.

## Submissions
Submission details are specified in the [Bid Solicitation Document](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21761/en_rfb_w0103-249585.pdf).

## Contract Details
* Contract Start Date: None
* Contract End Date: None

## Contact Information
* Justin Malchow
+ Phone: (236) 464-6737
+ Email: Justin.Malchow@forces.gc.ca
+ Address: CFB Esquimalt, Victoria, BC, Canada


Format lecture:

I structured the rewritten text in a number of ways:

- **Reference Information**: Open with the relevant reference details to facilitate quick information retrieval.

- **Project Description**: Provide a brief introduction to the project, including key milestones, requirements and restrictions.

- **Categories**: List the three categories to serve as a guide for potential bidders.
